name: Google Imagen4 Text to Image Generator Kie AI
description:
Generates images from text prompts using Google Imagen4 models, through the Kie.ai API. Can generate up to 4 images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025): $0.02 per image for imagen4-fast, $0.04 per image for imagen4, $0.06 per image for imagen4-ultra.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

default_model.description: The default model to use for image generation. Must be one of 'google/imagen4', 'google/imagen4-fast', 'google/imagen4-ultra', or empty. Defaults to ''google/imagen4'

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

filename.description: Optional string for base filename for saved images (without extension); defaults to None (uses task_id)

aspect_ratio.description: Optional image aspect ratio. Must be one of '1:1', '16:9', '9:16', '3:4', '4:3', or empty (omit for API default).

num_images.description: Optional number of images to generate. Must be one of '1', '2', '3', '4'. Limited to 1 for 'google/imagen4-ultra'. Defaults to '1' if empty

seed.description: Optional seed for reproducible generation. Default None, a random seed is chosen. Max length: 500 characters

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt to avoid in image generation. Max length : 5000 characters. Default None (omit if not provided)

model_override.description: Optional override of the default_model, must be one of 'google/imagen4-ultra', 'google/imagen4-fast', 'google/imagen4', empty string or None (treated as no override)

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate. Max length : 5000 characters.

saved_images_paths.description: Local paths to the saved image files

status.description: Status of the operation, such as 'success' or an error message

task_id.description: The ID of the created task

temporary_image_urls.description: Temporary URLs of the generated images
